content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: soul_torch
inventory=[{"type": "cyan_stained_glass", "quantity": 23, "index": 13}, {"type": "cobweb", "quantity": 23, "index": 14}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "pink_carpet", "quantity": 25, "index": 27}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 30, "index": 30}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "chainmail_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "enchanted_book", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "melon", "quantity": 58, "index": 38}, {"type": "prismarine_slab", "quantity": 25, "index": 41}, {"type": "coal_ore", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft a soul torch, I need to craft a stick and a coal. I already have a stick, but I need to smelt the coal_ore into coal. I will smelt the coal_ore from slot 42 into slot 11.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 42 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: soul_torch
inventory=[{"type": "coal", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "cyan_stained_glass", "quantity": 23, "index": 13}, {"type": "cobweb", "quantity": 23, "index": 14}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "pink_carpet", "quantity": 25, "index": 27}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 30, "index": 30}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "chainmail_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "enchanted_book", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "melon", "quantity": 58, "index": 38}, {"type": "prismarine_slab", "quantity": 25, "index": 41}]
thought: Now I have a stick and a coal, I can craft a soul torch by placing the coal on top of the stick in the crafting grid. I will move the coal from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: soul_torch
inventory=[{"type": "coal", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cyan_stained_glass", "quantity": 23, "index": 13}, {"type": "cobweb", "quantity": 23, "index": 14}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "pink_carpet", "quantity": 25, "index": 27}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 30, "index": 30}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "chainmail_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "enchanted_book", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "melon", "quantity": 58, "index": 38}, {"type": "prismarine_slab", "quantity": 25, "index": 41}]
thought: Now I have the coal in slot 1, I can place the stick on top of it by moving the stick from slot 34 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: soul_torch
inventory=[{"type": "torch", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "coal", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "cyan_stained_glass", "quantity": 23, "index": 13}, {"type": "cobweb", "quantity": 23, "index": 14}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "pink_carpet", "quantity": 25, "index": 27}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 30, "index": 30}, {"type": "chainmail_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "enchanted_book", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "melon", "quantity": 58, "index": 38}, {"type": "prismarine_slab", "quantity": 25, "index": 41}]
thought: Now I have the coal and the stick in the crafting grid, I can craft the soul torch by placing the soul sand to the right of the stick. I will move the soul sand from slot 15 to slot 7.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 7 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: soul_torch
inventory=[{"type": "soul_torch", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "coal", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "cyan_stained_glass", "quantity": 23, "index": 13}, {"type": "cobweb", "quantity": 23, "index": 14}, {"type": "pink_carpet", "quantity": 25, "index": 27}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 30, "index": 30}, {"type": "chainmail_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "enchanted_book", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "melon", "quantity": 58, "index": 38}, {"type": "prismarine_slab", "quantity": 25, "index": 41}]
thought: Now I have the soul torch in the crafting grid, I can move it to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
